title: what3words Gets $3.5M Led by Intel Capital To Simplify Location Sharing
description: Location-pinpointing platform what3words has closed a $3.5 million Series A funding round led by Intel Capital. It brings the total raised by the U.K. startup, which was only founded back in July 2013, to $5 million, after it topped up its initial $500,000 seed with a further $1 million last year. Read More
